title: Worst logo of this short millenium
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021001301im_/http:/typophile.com/files/frank%20kent_3776.jpg)

Link: [Frank Kent Motor Company](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021001301/http:/www.frankkent.com/)

Yes, this millenium has just started and I'm not a designer (which apparently means that I'm not really entitled to an opinion {grin}), but this icon for a local car dealer is as horrible as it is hilarious. This snip is from their website, but their local billboards are, if you can believe it, even worse. Surely this is an avatar of the Apocalypse.

DFW of DFW
author: DaveFW

comments.content: It's nothing spectacular, but calling it the worst might be a stretch.

yeah . . . what?

This is definitely not the worst I've seen.

you may want to take a look here first: [http://typophile.com/node/47232](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021001301/http:/typophile.com/node/47232 "http://typophile.com/node/47232")

penn
There is plenty of bad design. Why put this company in the spotlight?
Penn-- I had forgotten that one!

Calling out a local auto dealer on poor design seems incredibly lame. Do you point at poor people's clothing and laugh? There's plenty of bad design made by design firms - it seems a more worthy target.

**Paul Ducco**  
 [Graphic Design Melbourne](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021001301/http:/www.solid-creative.com/)
